Okay, you guys might know that kerbals have lights in their helmets, they have 2 on either side:confused:, for those who don't know. you can press any key relevant with lights but none turn on the head lights (u, or the button for lights on top menu, during flight) i am sure that their is no coding for these lights and would love to have them implemented, it makes walking on dark sides of planets easier without having to have a rover or space craft to light up your view! if there is a mod or i am wrong please tell me.

Thanks:D:)
Press the "L" Key when in EVA
This needs to be better documented... but other than that, it's already a thing, so there's not much purpose in this thread anymore, ehehe.
